name: Knightmare WebGL
description:
View the submission page for this entry

This is a WebGL version that we weren't able to get submitted in time for the game jam, we've added it to make playing the game more accessible for non-Windows users. Be sure to check out the official game jam submission to rate the game.

Knightmare is a roguelite dungeon crawler following the story of a young child who's learning to cope with nightmares. Play as ghostly knights, either as a single player or cooperatively with a friend, and help the child make it back to his bed before he gets overcome with fear. 



This is our  submission to Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2.
The theme is: You're not alone.  

Development by: Shane Buchan (startmovego)
Art and Design by: @thenamesnick
Sound Mixing by: Kevin Jones
